website_summaries.verdict: This eyeliner isn't for everyone but is a must-have for those who love to create high-drama winged eyes.
pros: A liquid liner with a fine point that's ideal for cat-eye looks
Color is dark and bold and lasts for hours on most users
Easy to control and goes on smoothly
cons: The exception to its long wear may be if you have oily skin
Product dries out fairly quickly in the tube

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid eyeliner period. 🤗🖤
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY!!! A liquid eye liner that dosen't fade! I've used both Kat's & Stilla's liquid eyeliner pens & both had their issues. Kat's pen dried up way to fast (after 1 month of 5-6 days a week usage). Stilla's faded by midday (working a service industry gig). Both faded/transfered in corner of my eye & wing. Tarte's Kitten hasn't failed me. Goes on smooth w/o tugging. Colour is blacker than the night, and it didn't fade in the inner eye corner or on the wing. Also the price is unbeatable..... Total score! 😃👍🏻🖤
customer_reviews.author: Ladymalingering

customer_reviews.title: Kat Von Who?  Best EYELINER EVA'!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner- super long lasting, easy to apply, great precision. I am obsessed with eyeliners & this is the best one I have ever used in 30 years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this brand at Ulta, but I found it on here even cheaper. Score for me! This eyeliner is great, I wear it every day. I’m a mechanic, and it does not wear off or flake off during the day. And the little kitty on top? Well that’s just a little extra joy to start your day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: my favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner, so glad amazon had it and for a cheaper price than I bought my last one for! This lasts so long and is super black so no need to re-apply throughout the day! Perfect for wingtip or just regular everyday "top line" like I'm wearing right now as I head out for a quick errand run. Love it 10/10 will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Fadden1

customer_reviews.title: Everybody wants it.
customer_reviews.text: I let my daughter and sister-in-law borrow it and they fell in love. Buying 2 more as gifts. I suck at make-up application, but even I can get a nice winged effect!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Not liquid
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get liquid liner. The outside box clearly says liquid but it's a pencil inside.
customer_reviews.author: Eden C.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product in box
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. The box is right but it’s not a liquid eyeliner in the box. 1st one I returned and requested replacement. Replacement was wrong too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting cat eye ahead
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful matte black. Easy to use with an ergonomic handle. Cute little cat shape to cap🖤
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I placed an order in December to have a little in stock. When i finally went to use my new liquid liner i opened the box to find a pencil. I love this brand but i did not order a pencil. I am now past my the ability to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly my favorite eye liner right now. Lasts long and so easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyeliner that I have ever purchased. It goes on smooth, its very precise even for the beginner user and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Dries out of ink fast
customer_reviews.text: This product might be counterfeit. It dried out in a month and a half of use. I get the same one from Sephora and dries out in 6 months. Very disappointed but it is a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product
customer_reviews.text: I love the Tarte brand but the product that arrived was not the liquid liner! Low rating is solely for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly i have bought many for my wife and this one works the best hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Stays put.
customer_reviews.text: The liner goes on easy and stays put all day. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hemmerick

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It goes on smoothly and stays on. I don't use any other eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reads

customer_reviews.title: Smug-proof❗️
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it, and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: 122653jackie

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite
customer_reviews.text: Super pigmented and easy to apply. Doesn’t dry out. Stay on all day
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive the liquid liner that I ordered. Won’t order this again, sadly as I really liked the liquid eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to buy over and over.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while now and I will continue to buy it over and over again. Goes on easily.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Steeves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect liquid liner
customer_reviews.text: Greatest liquid liner of all time! I’ve used this before and had to reorder because I love it so much! Easy to apply. Stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Recieved it quickly, and packaging was perfect... Will order again!
customer_reviews.author: kym hinton

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Stays well. Almost comparable to lorac’s pem which is my fave
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Goes on even and lasts all day ! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent. Not liquid
customer_reviews.text: It is not the liquid eyeliner as pictured. Right brand but not the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Best liquid eyeliner I have ever tried. Will order this many times over
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G.

customer_reviews.title: Pencil not Liquid Liner
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer described (and posted pictures) I received a pencil instead of liquid liner. I thought it must have been a mix up and sent it back for a replacement but again received a pencil. I’m not sure if the people processing this just don’t know the difference but what I got did not match the item description or pictures. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good liner
customer_reviews.text: I really like this liquid liner. Goes on smooth, dark & easy. Doesn't run but u may see a smudge if you don't fan it and let it dry before blinking.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Sexy Kitten!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner! The black is bold and matte when dry, the pen is super easy to use and this pen lasts forever! Also once dry it’s smudge-proof and stays on all day! This is the second one I’ve bought, the first lasted about 6 months !
customer_reviews.author: Lea Bates

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. Great tip to apply all shapes and practice if you're a beginner, long-lasting. And thank god it does not smudge. Can't say enough good things. Plus affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Farnoosh Brock

customer_reviews.title: False
customer_reviews.text: Item in the box was not the right product. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle L Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite liquid liner!! Very sharp and precise felt tip and cute kitty exterior design. This is my second time buying it
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Sziraczky

customer_reviews.title: Sex cats
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to liner whenever I want to feel like a sex kitten and this definitely gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Han

customer_reviews.title: liquid eyeliner OK, waterproof pencil better
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this since I LOVE the Sex Kitten waterproof eyeliner pencil. The liquid is OK but I prefer the other.
customer_reviews.author: MCT

customer_reviews.title: Cat eyes for days
customer_reviews.text: I make it easy to execute the perfect cat eye
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Rae Schexnayder

customer_reviews.title: Good but packaging flaw
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner but the lid is a pain to snap and keep on.
customer_reviews.author: K. Houle

customer_reviews.title: Great tip
customer_reviews.text: Makes great lines. Just have to remember to put tip back on. If u leave it off, it dries up and fast! I would buy it again for the clean lines it makes
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I have ever used! Does it come in any other color? I need a brown, blue and/or purple.
customer_reviews.author: liamsmoma

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner, worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: Actually got this from my mom out of a fab fit box (or some monthly box). Best eye liner I have used ever! Lasts all day and it glides on like liquid without the mess I make with liquid eyeliners
customer_reviews.author: kayla

product_meta.title: Tarte Sex Kitten Liquid Eyeliner Black
product_meta.description: Liquid eyeliner Black Net Wt. 1.4 ml / 0.047 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: Tarte Sex Kitten Liquid Eyeliner Black
